text: Amy Stiller (born August 9, 1961) is an American actress and stand-up comedian. ==Early life== Stiller was born in New York City, the daughter of Jewish-American comedians Jerry Stiller and Anne Meara, and the older sister of actor Ben Stiller. She graduated from the United Nations International School in New York City in 1979. ==Career== Stiller has performed in regional theater as well as off-Broadway theater. She has had numerous roles in films and television, including The King of Queens, Bored to Death, and Inside Amy Schumer. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Actresses from New York City Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American comedians Category:Comedians from New York City Category:American film actresses Category:American television actresses
title: Amy Stiller
